goal.en: This class is intended for students who are beginners to learning French. Through different topics related to daily life, the students will develop their French communication skills.
goal.ch: 本課程的教學對象為法語初學者，透過對話練習，讓學習者具有表達和日常生活相關主題的基礎能力。

content.en: The class will focus on learning different topics related to daily life. The students will learn basic sentence patterns, then practice the conversation.
content.ch: 透過不同情境的主題短篇對話文章，先學習基本固定句型，進而延伸做對話練習。

textbook.en: Claire Miquel, Communication progressive du français, niveau débutant, Cle international.
textbook.ch: Claire Miquel, Communication progressive du français, niveau débutant, Cle international.

grading.en: 1. Attendance (participation and behavior during the class will also be taken into consideration): 20％ 2. Assignments: 20％ 3. Midterm Exam 30％ 4. Final Exam 30％
grading.ch: 1. 課堂參與表現(出席、討論、發言、回答問題) : 20％ 2. 作業 : 20％ 3. 期中考: 30％ 4. 期末考: 30％

office_hr.en: Wednesday 15 h-17 h   Thursday 10 h-12 h

ch.Assessments: 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現
